title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 7 Pro - 6.3inches - 6GB RAM - 64GB ROM - 48MP + 5MP AI Dual Rear Camera
review: This is a nice looking set. Came the very next day I ordered. Haven't checked yet, but it is made in India. Box includes a free back cover. There is no warranty card or anything included, contacted Daraz and they said the invoice that we get in our emails will do. Hope I don't fall in problems with this... May update only if there is any problem with the set...
Well Packed, Quick Delivered, Received as I Ordered. A little bit disappointed due to the product is Made in India and there was no Invoice.

I didn't receive the product. Daraz played with me like a snake. I have lots of proof for that. And daraz showed my order is delivered in system to kill the issue. Instead of this if they tell me the truth for their mistake that should be good.

I bought Xiomi Note8 pro 6gb128gb rom from market. I am very much happy with that phone.

finally I got it
ok no problem
but I confused now
its indian version. it should be global version. still they are giving 1 year warrenty. lets see the service if any problem occur.

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 7S - 6.3inches - 4GB RAM - 64GB ROM - 48MP + 5MP AI Dual Rear Camera
review:
Well, Everything is great. Original and 100% authentic, Verified with MI. International version. but I don't like "Made in India "...  
I would have been happier if it was a Chinese Global version. 
any way, thanks to Daraz, as well as Xiaomi for an authentic product. 💙
The device is available on BTRC data base, and I also checked the warranty with Xiaomi.  That was okay...

got it in 15.11 offer. 
considering price, quite good mobile. but price decreased 800 tk in immediate next friday. product ok, but daraz pricing policy is poor. delivered in ctg in 6 days.

I have satisfied with this product. This is original and official mobile. Delivery was little bit delayed and packaging would be more better. Whatever I got my product safely and I am happy with it. Thanks

Orginal Phone and fast delivery I just love it.
Before time i just complaint about delivery service but now I am satisfied.
ভালোই । হেভি ইউজে অনেক গরম হয়। সব মিলিয়ে বাজেটের পারফেক্ট বলা যেতে পারে। তবে আইএমইআই একটি এক্টিভেট হয়েছে অন্যটি চলে তবে অফিশিয়াল বলছে না।

title: Redmi Note 8 Pro - 6.53inches - 6GB RAM - 64GB ROM - 20MP Selfie Camera
review: Original product. Well packed. i am satisfied for good service.  Everything ok but warranty card is blank. How to claim warranty without any documents?

The pack is housed with every accessories...I check the authorization by IMEI number and it's authorized by xiomi mi bd....the delivery is super fast by Daraz...
one thing is that it doesn't have international warranty...
